property.name: text
property.value: Authors: Ilge Akkaya and Shuhei Emoto

property.name: text
property.value:
This model illustrates how particle filters may be used by robots to determine the location of an intruder.
These robots can only detect the azimuth of the intruder, they do not detect the range.
